Account Manager.title: Account Manager
Account Manager.description: An account manager is responsible for managing relationships with clients, ensuring their needs are met, and identifying new business opportunities.
Account Manager.education: Bachelors degree in Business, Marketing or related field
Account Manager.experience: 3-5 years in sales or account management

Accountant.title: Accountant
Accountant.description: An accountant is responsible for preparing and examining financial records, ensuring accuracy and compliance with laws and regulations.
Accountant.education: Bachelors degree in Accounting or related field

Administrative Assistant.title: Administrative Assistant
Administrative Assistant.description: An administrative assistant provides administrative support to an organization, handling tasks such as scheduling, email management, and data entry.

Animator.title: Animator
Animator.description: An animator is responsible for creating motion graphics, visual effects, and animations for film, television, video games, or other forms of media.
Animator.education: Bachelors degree in Animation or related field

App Developer.title: App Developer
App Developer.description: An app developer designs, builds, and tests software applications for mobile and web platforms.
skills: Mobile app development frameworks (React Native, Flutter, etc.)
App Developer.education: Bachelor"s degree in Computer Science or related field

Architect.title: Architect
Architect.description: An architect designs buildings and spaces, ensuring they are functional, aesthetically pleasing, and meet building codes and regulations.
Architect.education: Professional degree in architecture (B.Arch or M.Arch)

Artist.title: Artist
Artist.description: An artist is a person who creates works of art, such as paintings, sculptures, or installations, for aesthetic or conceptual purposes.

Au Pair.title: Au Pair
Au Pair.description: An au pair is a domestic worker who lives with a family and provides childcare and light housekeeping services in exchange for room, board, and a stipend.

Auditor.title: Auditor
Auditor.description: An auditor examines and evaluates financial records to ensure accuracy and compliance with laws and regulations.
Auditor.education: Bachelors degree in Accounting or related field

Babysitter.title: Babysitter
Babysitter.description: A babysitter is responsible for the care and well-being of children, ensuring their safety and happiness while their parents are away.

Backend Developer.title: Backend Developer
Backend Developer.description: A backend developer is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining the server-side logic, database integration, and API connectivity of an application.
Backend Developer.education: Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field

Baker.title: Baker
Baker.description: A baker is responsible for preparing and baking bread, pastries, and other baked goods for consumption. This role requires a combination of culinary skills, attention to detail, and time management.
Baker.education: High school diploma or culinary degree

Barista.title: Barista
Barista.description: A barista is a skilled coffee maker who prepares and serves coffee drinks to customers in a fast-paced environment.

Bartender.title: Bartender
Bartender.description: A bartender is responsible for serving drinks, managing cash transactions, and providing excellent customer service in a fast-paced environment.

Bellboy.title: Bellboy
Bellboy.description: A bellboy is a hotel staff member responsible for assisting guests with their luggage, answering questions, and providing general hospitality.

Blogger.title: Blogger
Blogger.description: A blogger is a content creator who writes articles, stories, or reviews to engage with their audience and share their expertise or passions with the world.

Bodyguard.title: Bodyguard
Bodyguard.description: A bodyguard is responsible for providing security and protection to individuals, families, or groups, often in high-risk or high-profile situations.

Bookkeeper.title: Bookkeeper
Bookkeeper.description: A bookkeeper is responsible for recording and managing financial transactions, maintaining accurate financial records, and ensuring compliance with financial regulations.

Bookstore Owner.title: Bookstore Owner
Bookstore Owner.description: A bookstore owner is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of a bookstore, managing staff, and creating an inviting atmosphere for customers.
Bookstore Owner.education: Bachelors degree in Business or related field

Bouncer.title: Bouncer
Bouncer.description: A bouncer is a security personnel responsible for maintaining order, enforcing rules, and ensuring the safety of patrons in a nightclub or other venue.

Bus Driver.title: Bus Driver
Bus Driver.description: A bus driver is responsible for safely transporting passengers from one location to another, following a predetermined route.

Carnival Worker.title: Carnival Worker
Carnival Worker.description: A carnival worker is responsible for setting up and operating games, rides, and other attractions at carnivals and fairs, ensuring a safe and enjoyable experience for visitors.

Carpenter.title: Carpenter
Carpenter.description: A carpenter is a skilled tradesperson responsible for constructing, repairing, and installing structures and fixtures made of wood, wood substitutes, and other materials.

Cashier.title: Cashier
Cashier.description: A cashier is responsible for processing transactions, handling customer inquiries, and maintaining a clean and organized workspace.

Chauffeur.title: Chauffeur
Chauffeur.description: A chauffeur is a driver who transports passengers in a vehicle, often in a luxury or high-end setting.

Chef.title: Chef
Chef.description: A chef is a skilled cook who prepares and cooks food in a restaurant, hotel, or other food service establishment.

Coach.title: Coach
Coach.description: A coach is a person who guides and trains individuals or teams to improve their performance and achieve their goals, often in a specific sport or activity.

Comic Artist.title: Comic Artist
Comic Artist.description: A comic artist is a creator of comics and graphic novels, responsible for drawing, writing, and editing stories for publication.
Comic Artist.education: Bachelor"s degree in Fine Arts or related field

Comic Store Owner.title: Comic Store Owner
Comic Store Owner.description: A comic store owner is responsible for managing the daily operations of a comic book store, including inventory management, customer service, and community engagement.
Comic Store Owner.education: Bachelors degree in Business or related field

Construction Worker.title: Construction Worker
Construction Worker.description: A construction worker is responsible for assisting in the construction of buildings, roads, and other infrastructure projects. Tasks may include laboring, operating equipment, and following safety protocols.

Craftsman.title: Craftsman
Craftsman.description: A craftsman is a skilled worker who creates or repairs items of beauty or utility by hand, using traditional techniques and materials.

Customer Service Representative.title: Customer Service Representative
Customer Service Representative.description: A customer service representative is responsible for responding to customer inquiries, resolving issues, and providing excellent customer service.

Dancer.title: Dancer
Dancer.description: A dancer is a performer who uses movement and expression to convey emotion and tell stories through various dance styles.

Database Administrator.title: Database Administrator
Database Administrator.description: A database administrator is responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining databases to ensure efficient and secure storage and retrieval of data.
Database Administrator.education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science or related field

Daycare Worker.title: Daycare Worker
Daycare Worker.description: A daycare worker is responsible for caring for and supervising young children in a daycare setting, providing a safe and nurturing environment for their physical, emotional, and social development.

Delivery Driver.title: Delivery Driver
Delivery Driver.description: A delivery driver is responsible for transporting packages and goods to customers, ensuring timely and safe delivery.

Dentist.title: Dentist
Dentist.description: A dentist is a medical professional responsible for examining, diagnosing, and treating conditions of the teeth and mouth.

Dishwasher.title: Dishwasher
Dishwasher.description: A dishwasher is responsible for cleaning and maintaining the cleanliness of dishes, utensils, and equipment in a kitchen setting, adhering to health and safety standards.

Doctor.title: Doctor
Doctor.description: A doctor is a medical professional responsible for diagnosing and treating patients, developing treatment plans, and staying up-to-date with the latest medical advancements.
Doctor.education: Medical degree (MD) or Doctor of Osteopathic Medicine (DO)

Electrician.title: Electrician
Electrician.description: An electrician installs, maintains, and repairs electrical systems in buildings, homes, and factories.

Engineer.title: Engineer
Engineer.description: An engineer is responsible for designing, developing, testing, and maintaining various systems, products, and infrastructure.

Etsy Seller.title: Etsy Seller
Etsy Seller.description: An Etsy seller is responsible for creating and selling handmade or unique items on the Etsy online marketplace.

Executive Assistant.title: Executive Assistant
Executive Assistant.description: An executive assistant provides administrative support to high-level executives, managing calendars, coordinating travel, and handling confidential matters.

Farmer.title: Farmer
Farmer.description: A farmer cultivates and harvests crops, raises livestock, and manages the day-to-day activities of a farm.

Fast Food Worker.title: Fast Food Worker
Fast Food Worker.description: A fast food worker is responsible for preparing and serving food to customers in a fast-paced environment, ensuring a positive dining experience and maintaining a clean and safe work area.

Financial Advisor.title: Financial Advisor
Financial Advisor.description: A financial advisor helps clients create personalized financial plans, manages investments, and provides financial guidance to achieve long-term goals.
Financial Advisor.education: Bachelor"s degree in finance or related field

Financial Analyst.title: Financial Analyst
Financial Analyst.description: A financial analyst collects and analyzes financial data to help organizations make informed business decisions.

Firefighter.title: Firefighter
Firefighter.description: A firefighter is responsible for responding to emergencies, rescuing people, and extinguishing fires in a timely and efficient manner.

Flight Attendant.title: Flight Attendant
Flight Attendant.description: A flight attendant is responsible for ensuring passenger safety, comfort, and satisfaction during flights.

Foster Parent.title: Foster Parent
Foster Parent.description: A foster parent provides a temporary and supportive home for children who are unable to live with their biological parents.

Frontend Developer.title: Frontend Developer
Frontend Developer.description: A frontend developer is responsible for designing and building the user interface and user experience of a website or application, using programming languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Frontend Developer.education: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science or related field

Gambler.title: Gambler
Gambler.description: A gambler is someone who engages in betting or wagering on games of chance, often in pursuit of excitement, financial gain, or the thrill of competition.

Game Developer.title: Game Developer
Game Developer.description: A game developer designs, creates, and tests video games for PCs, consoles, or mobile devices.
Game Developer.education: Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field

Gardener.title: Gardener
Gardener.description: A gardener is responsible for maintaining gardens and grounds, including planting, pruning, and caring for plants.

Graphic Designer.title: Graphic Designer
Graphic Designer.description: A graphic designer creates visual content to communicate ideas and messages through various media, such as print, digital, and video.

Homemaker.title: Homemaker
Homemaker.description: A homemaker is responsible for managing and maintaining a household, including cooking, cleaning, and childcare, to ensure a comfortable and safe living environment for family members.

Hostess.title: Hostess
Hostess.description: A hostess is responsible for greeting guests, managing reservations, and coordinating the overall dining experience at a restaurant.

Housekeeper.title: Housekeeper
Housekeeper.description: A housekeeper is responsible for maintaining the cleanliness and organization of a private residence or commercial building, including dusting, vacuuming, and performing other tasks as needed.

Illustrator.title: Illustrator
Illustrator.description: An illustrator is a visual artist who creates original artwork for various mediums, including books, magazines, and advertising.

Influencer.title: Influencer
Influencer.description: An influencer is an individual who has built a significant following on social media and uses their platform to promote products, services, or ideas to their audience.

Insurance Agent.title: Insurance Agent
Insurance Agent.description: An insurance agent advises clients on insurance policies and sells insurance products to help protect them against financial risks. They must be knowledgeable about insurance laws, regulations, and products, and be able to communicate effectively with clients to understand their needs and provide tailored solutions.

Investment Banker.title: Investment Banker
Investment Banker.description: An investment banker is responsible for raising capital for companies, advising clients on mergers and acquisitions, and managing financial transactions.

Janitor.title: Janitor
Janitor.description: A janitor is responsible for maintaining the cleanliness and organization of buildings, including sweeping, mopping, and emptying trash.

Journalist.title: Journalist
Journalist.description: A journalist researches and writes articles for publication in newspapers, magazines, or online news outlets, often investigating and reporting on current events and news stories.
Journalist.education: Bachelors degree in Journalism or Communications

Landscaper.title: Landscaper
Landscaper.description: A landscaper is responsible for designing, installing, and maintaining outdoor spaces, such as gardens, parks, and residential properties.

Lawyer.title: Lawyer
Lawyer.description: A lawyer is a professional who advises clients on legal matters, represents them in court, and drafts legal documents.

Loan Officer.title: Loan Officer
Loan Officer.description: A loan officer is responsible for evaluating loan applications, assessing creditworthiness, and approving or denying loans to borrowers.

Lyft Driver.title: Lyft Driver
Lyft Driver.description: A Lyft driver is responsible for providing transportation services to passengers, ensuring their safety and comfort, and navigating through various routes to meet demand.

Machine Learning Engineer.title: Machine Learning Engineer
Machine Learning Engineer.description: A Machine Learning Engineer is responsible for designing, developing, and deploying artificial intelligence and machine learning models that can be integrated into software applications.
Machine Learning Engineer.education: Masters degree in Computer Science or related field

Mayor.title: Mayor
Mayor.description: A mayor is the chief executive officer of a city or town, responsible for making important decisions and policies to improve the quality of life for its citizens.

Musician.title: Musician
Musician.description: A musician is a performer who creates and performs music, often for live audiences or through recorded media.

Nanny.title: Nanny
Nanny.description: A nanny is a caregiver who is responsible for the daily care and well-being of children, often in a private home setting.

Nurse.title: Nurse
Nurse.description: A nurse is a healthcare professional responsible for providing patient care, administering medications, and educating patients on healthy habits.

Office Manager.title: Office Manager
Office Manager.description: An office manager is responsible for overseeing the day-to-day operations of an office, ensuring everything runs smoothly and efficiently.

Painter.title: Painter
Painter.description: A painter is responsible for creating artwork using various techniques and mediums, often for personal or commercial use.

Personal Assistant.title: Personal Assistant
Personal Assistant.description: A personal assistant provides administrative support to high-level executives, entrepreneurs, or individuals, handling tasks such as scheduling, travel arrangements, and correspondence.

Personal Trainer.title: Personal Trainer
Personal Trainer.description: A personal trainer is responsible for designing and implementing fitness programs for clients, providing guidance and support to help them achieve their health and fitness goals.

Photographer.title: Photographer
Photographer.description: A photographer is responsible for capturing images for various purposes, including advertising, events, and portraits.

Physical Therapist.title: Physical Therapist
Physical Therapist.description: A physical therapist helps patients recover from injuries or illnesses, improving their mobility and reducing pain.

Pilot.title: Pilot
Pilot.description: A pilot is responsible for safely operating an aircraft, ensuring the comfort and safety of passengers, and navigating through various weather conditions.
Pilot.education: High school diploma and commercial pilot license

Plumber.title: Plumber
Plumber.description: A plumber is a skilled tradesperson who installs, maintains, and repairs pipes, fixtures, and appliances that are connected to water and gas systems.

Police Officer.title: Police Officer
Police Officer.description: A police officer enforces laws and maintains order in a community, responding to emergency situations, and conducting investigations.
Police Officer.education: High school diploma or associates degree

Product Manager.title: Product Manager
Product Manager.description: A product manager is responsible for defining and delivering products that meet customer needs and drive business growth.

Program Manager.title: Program Manager
Program Manager.description: A program manager is responsible for overseeing the planning, execution, and delivery of specific programs or projects, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget.

Project Manager.title: Project Manager
Project Manager.description: A project manager is responsible for planning, organizing, and overseeing the execution of specific projects, ensuring they are completed on time, within budget, and to the required quality standards.

Psychologist.title: Psychologist
Psychologist.description: A psychologist is a mental health professional who studies the human mind and behavior, and provides counseling and therapy to individuals, groups, and communities.

Real Estate Agent.title: Real Estate Agent
Real Estate Agent.description: A real estate agent helps clients buy, sell, and rent properties, requiring strong communication and negotiation skills.

Receptionist.title: Receptionist
Receptionist.description: A receptionist is the first point of contact for visitors and clients, handling tasks such as answering phones, greeting guests, and managing paperwork.

Reporter.title: Reporter
Reporter.description: A reporter is a journalist who researches, writes, and presents news stories for publication or broadcast.
Reporter.education: Bachelors degree in Journalism or related field

Research Scientist.title: Research Scientist
Research Scientist.description: A research scientist is responsible for designing, conducting, and analyzing experiments to advance knowledge in their field, often in a laboratory or academic setting.

Retail Worker.title: Retail Worker
Retail Worker.description: A retail worker is responsible for providing excellent customer service, maintaining store appearance, and processing transactions.

Retired.title: Retiree
Retired.description: A retiree is an individual who has left the workforce and is no longer employed.

Salesperson.title: Salesperson
Salesperson.description: A salesperson is responsible for identifying and pursuing new sales opportunities, building relationships with customers, and meeting sales targets.

Scientist.title: Scientist
Scientist.description: A scientist conducts experiments, collects data, and analyzes results to understand and explain natural phenomena.

Secretary.title: Secretary
Secretary.description: A secretary is responsible for providing administrative support to a business or organization, handling tasks such as scheduling appointments, preparing documents, and answering phone calls.

Security Guard.title: Security Guard
Security Guard.description: A security guard is responsible for protecting people and property by monitoring premises, enforcing rules, and responding to emergencies.

Single Parent.title: Single Parent
Single Parent.description: A single parent is a parent who cares for their child alone, often balancing work, childcare, and household responsibilities.

Small Business Owner.title: Small Business Owner
Small Business Owner.description: A small business owner is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of a small business, including managing finances, hiring employees, and making strategic decisions.

Social Worker.title: Social Worker
Social Worker.description: A social worker is a professional who helps individuals, families, and communities cope with problems such as poverty, education, and healthcare.

Soldier.title: Soldier
Soldier.description: A soldier is a military personnel who carries out various tasks to protect and defend a country, its citizens, and its interests.

Stay-at-Home Mom.title: Stay-at-Home Mom
Stay-at-Home Mom.description: A stay-at-home mom is responsible for caring for and nurturing children, managing the household, and supporting family members.
Stay-at-Home Mom.experience: 1-2 years of childcare experience or equivalent

Stay-at-home Parent.title: Stay-at-home Parent
Stay-at-home Parent.description: A stay-at-home parent is responsible for the daily care and well-being of their children, including tasks such as feeding, bathing, and providing emotional support.
Stay-at-home Parent.experience: Variable, typically caring for young children

Stock Clerk.title: Stock Clerk
Stock Clerk.description: A stock clerk is responsible for receiving, storing, and issuing stockroom supplies, materials, and finished products to production or warehouse operations.

Stripper.title: Stripper
Stripper.description: A stripper is a performer who entertains audiences by dancing and performing in a suggestive or erotic manner, often in a nightclub or other adult entertainment venue.

Student.title: Student
Student.description: A student is an individual who is formally engaged in an educational program at a school, college, or university.

Taxi Driver.title: Taxi Driver
Taxi Driver.description: A taxi driver is responsible for safely transporting passengers from one location to another, providing a safe and comfortable experience for the passenger.

Teacher.title: Teacher
Teacher.description: A teacher is responsible for educating students, creating lesson plans, and assessing student progress to help them achieve academic success.

Therapist.title: Therapist
Therapist.description: A therapist works with patients to identify and overcome emotional and psychological issues, promoting mental health and wellbeing through counseling and therapy.
Therapist.education: Masters degree in Psychology or related field

Truck Driver.title: Truck Driver
Truck Driver.description: A truck driver is responsible for transporting goods and materials from one location to another, ensuring timely delivery and safety of cargo.

Tutor.title: Tutor
Tutor.description: A tutor provides one-on-one instruction to students, helping them understand and master a particular subject or skill.

Uber Driver.title: Uber Driver
Uber Driver.description: An Uber driver is responsible for transporting passengers safely and efficiently, using a smartphone app to accept ride requests and navigate to pickup and dropoff locations.

Unemployed.title: Unemployed
Unemployed.description: An unemployed person is someone who is not currently working, often actively seeking employment or further education.

Voice Actor.title: Voice Actor
Voice Actor.description: A voice actor is responsible for providing voice-overs for audio and video recordings, such as commercials, animations, and video games.

Waiter.title: Waiter
Waiter.description: A waiter is responsible for taking orders, serving food and drinks to customers, and providing a positive dining experience.

Waitress.title: Waitress
Waitress.description: A waitress is responsible for taking orders, serving food and drinks, and handling customer transactions in a fast-paced dining environment.

Web Developer.title: Web Developer
Web Developer.description: A web developer designs, builds, and maintains websites and web applications using programming languages, frameworks, and databases.

Writer.title: Writer
Writer.description: A writer is responsible for researching and writing engaging content for various mediums, such as articles, blogs, and books.
Writer.education: Bachelor"s degree in English, Journalism, or Communications
